name: rankval
body: |- wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))))

comment: Value of the rank function. Definition 9.14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79 (proved as a theorem from our definition). (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2013.)
